Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml

Class SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.swedenconnect.signservice.core.AbstractSignServiceHandler
      • se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
        • se.swedenconnect.signservice.authn.saml.SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationHandler, HttpResourceProvider, SignServiceHandler
    public class SwedenConnectSamlAuthenticationHandler
extends AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
    A SAML authentication handler that implements the SAML profiles stated in Sweden Connect eID Framework.

        Overrides:

      • resetContext

        protected void resetContext​(@Nonnull
                            SignServiceContext context)
        Is invoked to reset the context, i.e., to remove elements that were added by this handler. If overridden, the super implementation should always be called.
        Overrides:
        resetContext in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
        Parameters:
        context - the SignService context.

                                 @Nonnull

        Overrides:
        assertSignMessage in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
        Parameters:
        signMessage - the sign message that was requsted (may be null)
        attributes - the received attributes
        result - the processing result
        authnRequest - the sent authentication request
        context - the SignService context

      • wasSignMessageDisplayed

        protected boolean wasSignMessageDisplayed​(@Nonnull
                                          ResponseProcessingResult result,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          List<IdentityAttribute<?>> attributes,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          AuthnRequest authnRequest,
                                          @Nonnull
                                          SignServiceContext context)
                                   throws UserAuthenticationException
        Returns trueÂ if the signMessageDigest attribute was received.
        Overrides:
        wasSignMessageDisplayed in class AbstractSamlAuthenticationHandler
        Parameters:
        result - the processing result
        attributes - the received attributes (in generic format)
        authnRequest - the authentication request
        context - the SignService context
        Returns:
        a flag indicating whether the sign message was displayed or not
        Throws:
        UserAuthenticationException - for processing errors, i.e., the proof for a displayed sign message is illegal

      • setSadValidator

        public void setSadValidator​(@Nonnull
                            SADParser.SADValidator sadValidator)
        Assigns the SADParser.SADValidator to be used when validating SAD attributes. If not explicitly assigned a validator is created using SADParser.getValidator(MetadataProvider).
        Parameters:
        sadValidator - the SAD validator
